intro: Zehneria baueriana, commonly known as the Bauer's zehneria, is a species of flowering plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in the Amazon rainforest. Zehneria baueriana is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking floral display.
